tasks.label: flask and hot-reload - no docker-compose
tasks.command: docker run -it --rm -e FLASK_APP=app.py -e FLASK_ENV=development -p 5000:5000 -v ${PWD}:/app --name flaskcontainer flask flask run --host 0.0.0.0

tasks.label: flask and hot-reload
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm -e FLASK_APP=app.py -e FLASK_ENV=development --service-ports flask-server flask run --host 0.0.0.0

tasks.label: flask, hot-reload and VS Code debugger
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm -e DEBUGGER=True -e FLASK_APP=app.py -e FLASK_ENV=development --service-ports flask-server flask run --host 0.0.0.0

tasks.label: gunicorn, hot-reload and VS Code debugger
tasks.command: docker-compose run --rm -e DEBUGGER=True --service-ports flask-server gunicorn --reload --bind 0.0.0.0:5000 --timeout 3600 app:app
